name: Introduction to Peace and Conflict Studies (formerly PCS260Y1, UNI110Y1, UNI260Y1)
description: A review of the full range of theories explaining the nature and causes of conflict and possibilities for its resolution; provides students with a set of theoretical tools for effective analysis of interpersonal, civil, and international conflict.
department: Munk School of Global Affairs and Public Policy
prerequisites: Only for current PCJ program students in second year and higher/permission of the Program Director
